channel.title: Klonoa - Stable server, working reports
channel.description:
Well, I am in the process of making a new server, I am not going to use this for my use, so I will be releasing. This topic is just to tell you what I have done, and how well it is going.
This base is Devolution version 1, it is now more stable with anti flood system.
I will need some testers, you will not be rewarded, just want to check all the systems are working fine, if you would like to test, please add my msn: javaproject@hotmail.co.uk
*THIS IS NOT THE ACTUAL KLONOA SERVER, KLONOA HAS NOT BEEN RELEASED*
[b]What I have added[/b] -Working report system, 100% like Runescape -Working filter system, no bad language. -Custom items in client have been added to the server (Taken a lot of time more that 200 items) -Added a few shops. -100% Dragon claws (This code was made by me, feel free to leech when I release the server) -Anti flood system -Thread per client thanks stormcutter
[b]Pictures[/b] [b]Player who is reporting[/b] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/28k7hbk.jpg[/img] [b]Moderator who receives message.[/b] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/154k0np.jpg[/img] *Coming soon need to test the systems out first*
[b]Credits[/b] - Bakatool - Stormcutter - Any other people I forgot to mention.

item.dc:creator: @java_is_on_my_pancak java is on my pancake
item.description:
@java_is_on_my_pancak wrote:

Hi its campkz zilch’s friend Ive played your server…
You should proberly change the exp rates…
Sorry but there fast which i like but too fast…
Apart from that great.

Read full topic
